WorkItem.Description:
Having used rawr in TBC with my mage i was very excited when i saw that a dps death knight model had been added. Yet when i attempted to load my character (Darthvoder of Barthilas) i received an error message stating in exact words "Rawr encountered an error while attempting to load a saved image. If you encounter this error multiple times, please ensure Rawr is unzipped in a location where you have full read/write access, such as your desktop, or my documents." 
Â 
I have so far tried running Rawr from my desktop, my documents, loading another dk from the armory, re-downloading Rawr 2.1.1  and using Rawr 2.1. Having also tried loading characters of other classes and servers i have received no errors unlike the one above which occurs without fail every time i attempt to load a death knight from the armory
WorkItem.Summary: Problems loading Death Knights off Armory

Comments.Message:
Found the bug, and fixed it (sometime late in beta, looks like Blizz changed the class ID for DKs from 12 to 6, if anyone cares).


P.S. No, your name is not cool/creative/anything good.
wow... thx for the fix but the P.S? cruel and unnecessary? Someone needs to find an appropriate channel for their anger rather then attacking strangers over the net :)
